00015 /// \file
00016 /// Provides the State class.
00017 
00018 #ifndef __STATE_HPP
00019 #define __STATE_HPP
00020 
00021 #include <data.hpp>
00022 #include <thread.hpp>
00023 
00024 /// A state variable.
00025 /**
00026  * \see Instructions::INIT_FEEDBACK
00027  * \see Instructions::FEEDBACK
00028  */
00029 class State {
00030     public:
00031         
00032         /// The data contained in this state variable.
00033         Data data;
00034         
00035         /// A boolean indicating wheter this state variable was used in the last round (true) or not (false).
00036         /**
00037          * When a state variable is not used in a run of the thread this state variable belongs to, it is reset by the machine.
00038          */
00039         bool is_executed;
00040         
00041         /// The thread that this state variable belongs to.
00042         Thread::Id thread;
00043         
00044         /// The default constructor.
00045         State() : is_executed(false) {}
00046         
00047 };
00048 
00049 #endif
